Teten Bakal Copot Anak Buah yang Hambat UMKM
05 Nov 2019, 10:59 by Anisa Indraini


Foto: Anisa Indraini

Jakarta - Menteri Koperasi dan Usaha Kecil Menengah (UKM) Teten Masduki menegaskan akan mempermudah segala urusan UMKM untuk berkembang. Jika ada pihaknya yang mempersulit UMKM seperti meminta bayaran, maka ia tidak segan untuk mencopot jabatannya."Jadi laporkan saja kalau ada petugas kami, aparat kami yang mempersulit UMKM apalagi minta bayaran dan sebagainya. Saya nggak segan akan saya copot," tegas Teten di kantornya, Selasa (5/11/2019).Dia pun memastikan bahwa kementeriannya akan menjadi advokat bagi para UMKM dengan melindungi UMKM dari tindak eksploitasi. Ke depan, ia akan membuat tempat untuk para UMKM berkonsultasi terkait masalah yang dihadapinya. "Nanti kita coba atasi dengan membuat tempat UMKM bertanya apa saja, tempat konsultasi mulai dari pengembangan usaha, termasuk kasus-kasus hukum, kita akan taro desk di sana," katanya.Selain itu, ia juga akan membentuk tim yang akan mobile agar bisa merespons kasus-kasus yang dialami UMKM dengan cepat."Kita juga akan ada tim yang mobile bisa segera merespons kasus-kasus tertentu di berbagai daerah yang dialami UMKM," imbuhnya.Hal itu dilakukan agar para UMKM bisa semangat untuk menuju pasar global. Sesuai dengan arahan Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi), UMKM menjadi andalan untuk meningkatkan pertumbuhan ekonomi Indonesia. Diharapkan, UMKM dapat menggerakkan perekonomian, memberikan penyerapan tenaga kerja, serta mampu menghasilkan devisa bagi negara."Pak presiden saat pengenalan kabinet presiden akan fokus untuk penguatan UMKM dan Koperasi dan sumber daya manusia. Ini perintah kepada kami jadi kami harus segera merumuskan," ujar Teten.Simak Video "Optimisme Teten Masduki Jadi Menkop, Siap Bikin UMKM Naik Kelas"[Gambas:Video 20detik](fdl/fdl)
text:
Teten Will Take Out the Subordinates That Obstruct SMEs
05 Nov 2019, 10:59 by Anisa Indraini


Photo: Anisa Indraini

Jakarta - Minister of Cooperatives and Small and Medium Enterprises (UKM) Teten Masduki emphasized that it would make it easier for all UMKM affairs to develop. If there is a party that complicates MSMEs such as asking for payment, then he is not reluctant to remove his position. "So just report it if there are our officers, our officials who complicate MSMEs let alone ask for fees and so on. , Tuesday (11/5/2019). He also ensured that his ministry would become an advocate for MSMEs by protecting MSMEs from exploitation. In the future, he will make a place for SMEs to consult related to the problems they face. "Later we will try to overcome it by making MSMEs ask questions, consultations starting from business development, including legal cases, we will put a desk there," he said. In addition, he will also form a team that will be mobile to be able to respond cases that are experienced by MSMEs quickly. "We will also have a mobile team that can immediately respond to certain cases in various regions experienced by MSMEs," he added. This was done so that MSMEs could be enthusiastic about going towards the global market. In accordance with the direction of President Joko Widodo (Jokowi), UMKM has become a mainstay for increasing Indonesia's economic growth. It is hoped that MSMEs can move the economy, provide employment, and be able to generate foreign exchange for the country. "The president at the introduction of the president's cabinet will focus on strengthening MSMEs and Cooperatives and human resources. This is an order for us so we must immediately formulate," he said. Teten.Simak Video "Optimism of Teten Masduki Becomes Menkop, Ready to Make UMKM Up in Class" [Gambas: Video 20second] (fdl / fdl)
